column1: Kata Robata////The first time I went here we had the lobster mac and cheese
column5: and the kobe beef skewer. We also had a dessert
column6: but I can't exactly remember what it was
column8: and a piece of a cake
column9: since I can't remember the exact name
column10: I'll leave that out of the review. Yesterday when I came
column11: I ordered the duck dumpling ramen (all to myself)
column12: my boyfriend ordered the spicy soy ramen and the mac and cheese once again.
